pages.text: The ores you can find Beneath are mostly similar to what you can find on the surface, but with a few changes. Consult the $(l:tfg_ores)Ores in TFG$() category for exact details.

pages.title: Migmatite
pages.text: The most common rock type found is Migmatite. This deep metamorphic rock contains a wide variety of ores you'd normally find in other rock types on the surface.

pages.title: Travertine
pages.text: In wetter areas, you may find $(thing)Travertine$(). It is a sedimentary rock that can contain the same kind of ores as Migmatite.

pages.title: Pyroxenite
pages.text: Around the deepest level of the Beneath, the different rock types gradually all turn into $(thing)Pyroxenite$(). This ultramafic igneous rock is extremely rich in ores, but this depth also comes with extreme heat, so be prepared!

pages.name: Anthracite
pages.text: Anthracite is a powerful $(l:beneath/hellforge)fuel$(). It can be found in Migmatite in the upper half of the Beneath.

pages.name: Sylvite
pages.text: Sylvite is a fertiliser that can be found in Pyroxenite in the lower half of the Beneath.
